info.title: Voucherify API
info.description: Voucherify promotion engine REST API. Please see https://docs.voucherify.io/docs for more details.

get.description:
Returns the list of segments IDs to which the customer belongs to.  

If you pass a `customerId` which is not stored and recognized by Voucherify as an existing customer in the system, the response will generate a list of segments that the customer would potentialy qualify for if they were to become a customer tracked in the system.

200.description: The method returns segment(s) to which the given customer belongs to.

object.description: The type of the object represented by JSON. This object stores information about customer segments.

data_ref.description: Identifies the name of the JSON property that contains the array of segment IDs.

data.description: A dictionary that contains an array of segment IDs and names.

total.description: Total number of segments the customer belongs to.

object.description: The type of the object represented by the ID.
